title: Alaska Public Lands: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks          Results   Showing results 1-9 of 9    Sort By:  Title Date         Alaska Public Lands Climate Change Kit    This kit provides students with the chance to learn more about climate change and renewable energy through activities and demonstrations. Packed with curriculum and starter kits your students will have a blast learning together.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Third Grade-Eighth Grade Subjects:Climate, Climate Change, Earth Science, Economics, Environment, Meteorology, Science and Technology        Alaska Public Lands Dinosaur Kit    Dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals once roamed across the world, including Alaska. More than a dozen dinosaur species have been found in Alaska alone! This kit will give you an opportunity to learn about a few.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Second Grade-Third Grade Subjects:Biodiversity, Biology: Animals, Earth Science, Paleontology        Alaska Public Lands Fire in Alaska Kit    This educational kit provides teachers and students with an excellent opportunity to learn about the importance and problems of fires. they will be able to identify hazard signs and natural change while taking part in group activities.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Sixth Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:Ecology, Fire Ecology, Fire Safety, Safety, Wilderness, Wildlife Management        Alaska Public Lands Loon Kit    This kit comes loaded with materials to connect your class with the wonders of the loon. With tapes, videos and even a loon costume your class is bound to enjoy this kit.    Type:Traveling Trunk Subjects:Biology: Animals, Earth Science        Alaska Public Lands Marine Mammals Kit    With over 6,500 miles of coastline, Alaska has a diversity of marine mammals. This kit provides an opportunity to have fun while learning about these amazing creatures.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Kindergarten-General Subjects:Aquatic Studies, Biodiversity, Biology: Animals, Marine Biology, Maritime History, Oceanography, Wildlife Biology Keywords:marine mammals, polar bear, walrus, whales, ocean animals, otters, seals, Sea Lions, dolphins, porpoise        Alaska Public Lands Math in Basketry kit   This kit allows the student to see math within the Native arts of the Tlingit people of Southeast Alaska. Understand math with hands-on activities, using Tlingit baskets and weaving materials.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Third Grade-Adult Education (general) Subjects:American Indian History and Culture, Archaeology, Geometry, Mathematics, Social Studies        Alaska Public Lands Russian History Kit    This kit brings the story of Russia's colonial history in North America to life. Explore Alaska's Russian influence and cultural exchanges through stories and activities.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Sixth Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:American Indian History and Culture, Archaeology, Colonial History, Economics, History, Social Studies        Alaska Public Lands Track Kit    Teachers and students will have the opportunity to discover the wonders of animal identification through animal tracks. Activities and samples will enhance their experience.    Type:Traveling Trunk Subjects:Biology: Animals, Wildlife Biology, Wildlife Management        Alaska Public Lands Wolf Kit    This is a great opportunity for your students as a pack to learn more about wolves and their natural way of life. Learn more about these wonderful creatures.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Pre-Kindergarten-Adult Education (general) Subjects:Biology: Animals, Ecology, Environment, Wildlife Biology, Wildlife Management Keywords:wolves, wolf, Skull, wildlife, wildlife management
